This is a find...scared the crap out me when I was 11. I'm looking forward to watching it; Thank you very much! 

With all the advances in animatronics and CGI this story would make a great remodel/remake...again. It would have to be directed by Guillermo del Toro or Tomas Alfredson...someone who can get dark without going down the Disney is-anybody-there-jump-out-of-your-seat crap...Of course, if anyone with the funding is reading I'm available  in all capacities: directing, screen writing, key grip, running, coffe making etc.
